description: Example spec-manager.json configuration for GitHub with prefix-aware input mode enabled

_comments.trackingSystem: Set to 'github' when using GitHub Issues
_comments.usePrefix: Enables prefix-aware input mode - type just '7' instead of 'GITHUB-7'
_comments.projectPrefix: The prefix to prepend to numeric identifiers - must end with '-' or '_'
_comments.lastUpdated: ISO 8601 timestamp - automatically updated by Kiro

benefits: Type just the issue number (e.g., '7') instead of the full identifier ('GITHUB-7')
Auto-increment will suggest the next GitHub issue number
URLs will be automatically reconstructed as https://github.com/unlimitechcloud/kiro.spec-manager/issues/{number}
Both numeric input and full identifiers are accepted
example_workflow: Kiro: 'Identifier (GITHUB-): [Press Enter for GITHUB-6, or type '7' for GITHUB-7]'
Result: Spec created with identifier GITHUB-7
